author: Reuters Editorial
title: Bathroom Banksy: Street-artist stays home for new lockdown work
description: Street-artist Banksy has followed official advice to stay at home during the coronavirus crisis by creating a new artwork in his bathroom that shows his trademark stencilled rats running amok around the sink and toilet.
content:
LONDON (Reuters) - Street-artist Banksy has followed official advice to stay at home during the coronavirus crisis by creating a new artwork in his bathroom that shows his trademark stencilled rats running amok around the sink and toilet. 
The elusive artist… [+790 chars]
